63713.summary: Some customers in the Waverley Heights area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63713.title: July 8 - Winnipeg (Waverley Heights) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. A further update will be provided at 10:42 PT. Thank you for your patience.
